oai_dc:dc.dc:title: PGS: Revolutionising Organics in the Pacific. Enhancing Pacific farmer’s access to certification
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hazelman, Stephen
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Values, standards and certification
Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: PGS can be used as a holistic development tool, particularly when embraced by traditional leadership and governance structures as has happened in 2 Pacific Islands resulting in the entire islands being managed organically through PGS. PGS can serve as a catalyst for community engagement and vision building; capacity building and farmer empowerment; improved production and marketing and environmental protection.
